Box Fort, professional cases and containers

With more than 25 years' experience, BOXFORT is still manufacturing cases and continually improving its products. With an extensive range of standard cases in aluminium, plastic, propylene, ABS, double wall, waterproof, in textile materials, custom-made flight cases and cases in general, BOXFORT covers the majority of requirements.
